name: Growing Garden
description:
Made for the Mini Guinxu Jam in 2 hours.

Water the plants to their optimal growth. When you water a plant the adjacent ones will also get watered, be careful not to overwater them!

By the mc2games team:

  • Kiko Martínez Cervera
  • Maribel Martínez Cervera
  • With the help of Sandra Hernández Hervás for the puzzle design
